title: Strong Mac,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: Dod, sir, but I'm pleased ye agree wi' me.

title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: but with themselves — Augustine, Milton, Luther, Melancthon,  George Herbert, Baxter, Howe, Owen, Leighton,  Barrow, Bunyan, Philip and Matthew Henry, Dod- dridge, Defoe, Marvel, Locke, Berkeley, Halliburton, Cowper, Gray, Johnson, Gibbon, and David Hume, 1 Jortin, Boston, Bengel, Neander, etc., not to speak of the apostles, and above all, his chief friend the author of the Epistle to the Romans, whom he looked on as the greatest of men, — with all these he had personal relations as men, he cordialized with them.
